definition: surname Gui/abbr. for Guangxi Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]

sentences.english: No. 7:Sorry to have kept you waiting . Here is your Steamed Mandarin Fish .
sentences.chinese: 抱歉讓您久等了，這是您的清蒸桂魚。

sentences.english: Huang Sang fish is to culture-based, supplemented by Ding Gui fish.
sentences.chinese: 以養殖黃顙魚爲主，丁桂魚爲輔。

sentences.english: This mandarin fish tastes as if it were caught a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 這條桂魚喫起來好像是一年前捉來的。

sentences.english: Salmon is a kind of fish.
Mandarin fish is te best one of the freshwater fish. The chef processes this kind of fish in a special way.
sentences.chinese: 桂魚是淡水魚中最好的品種，孔府菜對桂魚做法特別。

sentences.english: Mandarin fish is te best one of the freshwater fish. The chef processes this kind of fish in a special way.
sentences.chinese: 桂魚是淡水魚中最好的品種，孔府菜對桂魚做法特別。

definition: Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]

yuxiang, a seasoning of Chinese cuisine that typically contains garlic, scallions, ginger, sugar, salt, chili peppers etc (Although "yuxiang" literally means "fish fragrance", it contains no seafood.)
chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
